issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

3.5.4 + iOS4.2 + itunes 10.1+ running mobile sdk version 1.5.0.1f46b05 + the nonJIT version of TiJsCore on an ipod occurs in 4.1 and 4.2

1.Platform > XHR > File Download

results: crashes on load, console:

Mon Nov 8 15:08:52 unknown com.apple.launchd[1] : (UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.KitchenSink[0x52d8]) Job appears to have crashed: Bus error

regression

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Crash on load (bus error) on File download test

Unable to repro on 4.2/3GT/1.5.0.7072de. Possibly fixed by some of the #2299 commits unless this is device-specific.

Thom, can you still reproduce?
